sense.name: be uncertain or not confident about something
sense.examples: I doubt whether I can finish the work on time. They had begun to doubt that it could be completed in time. He may come back tomorrow with the money, but I very much doubt it. I don't doubt his abilities. We doubted the leader could maintain his place.

sense.name: lack trust or belief in someone
sense.examples: He's never lied to me before, so I have no reason to doubt his word. What puzzels me is why the case woker doubted her. Certainly a lot of people are doubting me again, but I think I'll be fine.
